price: 42. Loba: Nani abatelaka bino o kati na butu тре па тоуі па etumbu ya Ar-Rahmân? Мре bazali kopesa mokongo na bokundoli ya Nkolo wa bango.
arabic: قُلۡ مَن يَكۡلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul man yakla-ukum bi-al-layli wal-nahāri mina al-raḥmāni bal hum ʿan dhik'ri rabbihim muʿ'riḍūna
